item.description:
Winter Wonderland artist reception meet and greet. If you haven't been to Caffe Dolce for a while, come on down there and check out the fine images. Over coffee. Or hot chocolate. The white hot chocolate is especially good. The artists will be at Caffe Dolce on Shrewsbury Street Worcester.

Saturday, Nov. 18 from 3 to 6

Mark it down! This is when the artists will be having a reception at the caffe, so come by, invite friends and family and fellow photo lovers.

If you can't make it that day, but would like to see the work and partake of some of the best coffee and desserts Worcester can offer, swing by Caff√© Dolce (open M-Th 4pm-midnight, F & Sat, 4pm-1am, and Sundays 3pm-11pm) and check it out!

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Winter Wonderland at Caffe Dolce!
